N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 252.3 - Procedure

State Regulations
(a) Upon receipt of
a misbehavior report from the review officer, the violation officer shall: (1)
give a copy of the misbehavior report to
the inmate at the violation hearing; (2)
allow the inmate to be present at the
violation hearing, unless he refuses to attend; and
(3)
allow the inmate to present documentary
evidence, to submit a written statement on his behalf, and to reply to the
charge. The inmate shall not have the right to call witnesses on his
behalf. (b) The
violation officer may allow any evidence necessary to aid in his
decision. Notes
